controller
Class AvailableItems<T extends ListedItem>

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      controller.AvailableItems<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of items contained in this model. Must subclass ListedItem.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.ListModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
AvailableItems.AvailableIngredients, AvailableItems.AvailableRecipes
public abstract class AvailableItems<T extends ListedItem>
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

A ListModel containing all the ListedItems of a given type that are available for use.

217262
